WorkItem.Description:
I have a problem when I try to select an item via code for an AutoCompleteBox in the Window_Loaded event: the item is correctly associated to the SelectedItem property, but the text is not visible.
If I try to set the item as SelectedItem later (e.g. on a button click) it works correctly.
The problem arises both if I try to write directly to SelectedItem property or if I write to a property binded to SelectedItem.
Â 
I tried to debug the code of AutoCompleteBox, I can see that the FormatValue function call a _valueBindingEvaluator.GetDynamicValue that returns a null string when the SelectedItem is set in Window_Loaded, while it returns the correct value later.
Does anybody have any idea for this problem? Am I doing something wrong?
WorkItem.Summary: AutoCompleteBox: text not visible when setting SelectedItem on load

Comments.Message:
Apparently the problem has to do with the time of initialization, when the binding is being evaluated it always returns a null value. I've fixed this issue by appending at the end of AutoCompleteBox.OnApplyTemplate() the line:

			Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(new Action(() => OnSelectedItemChanged(SelectedItem)));
Regards,
Pablo
